forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 38F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
